translations.name: The Living Bible
translations.description: This paraphrase was the first non-official translation of the entire Bible in Afrikaans. It was translated in the tradition of the Living Bible from 1971, using a language and style that is very similar to it.[6] The Bible was translated by Du Toit van der Merwe.

translations.name: Die Lewende Bybel
translations.description: This paraphrase was the first non-official translation of the entire Bible in Afrikaans. It was translated in the tradition of the Living Bible from 1971, using a language and style that is very similar to it.[6] The Bible was translated by Du Toit van der Merwe.
